message: This is a rare opportunity to acquire a high-quality product that is worth $2000000 to you. I'm offering it to you for a limited time at the special price of $1000000. This is a 50% discount from its true value. Don't miss out on this incredible deal! Will you take it?
I'm not buying it, I'd rather wait for more information and not overpay for a product that might be low quality.

I understand your concerns, Bob. Let me offer you some additional information. I've had multiple buyers purchase similar products from me in the past, and 95% of them have been extremely satisfied with their purchases. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity to own a high-quality product that has a very high chance of meeting your expectations?

Your past buyers' satisfaction rate is interesting, but it doesn't change the fact that there's still a 20% chance the product is low quality and worthless to me. I'd rather wait for more information.

Your guarantee is tempting, but I still can't justify spending $1000000 on a product that has a 20% chance of being worthless. I'd rather wait for more information or a better deal.
